channel.title: Tgrid on mrgsolve
channel.description: Recent content in Tgrid on mrgsolve

item.title: Flexible, heterogeneous simulation designs in a population
item.description: Design lists help you assign different designs to different groups in a population or specific designs to specific individuals. library(mrgsolve) library(dplyr) Assign designs to individuals To illustrate, let’s make a population of 4 individuals, all with different simulation end times. des <- data_frame(ID=1:4, end=seq(24,96,24)) des . # A tibble: 4 × 2 . ID end . <int> <dbl> . 1 1 24 . 2 2 48 . 3 3 72 .
